title: AI chatbots to face UK safety rules after outcry over Grok
summary_full: "The new measures announced today include crackdown on vile illegal content created by AI," UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer said on Monday
summary_public: "The new measures announced today include crackdown on vile illegal content created by AI," UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer said on Monday
